item.title: Ottawa shootings: Canada to toughen terror laws - BBC News
item.description:
BBC News
Ottawa shootings: Canada to toughen terror laws
BBC News
Canadian Prime Minister Stephen Harper has vowed to strengthen the nation's terror laws one day after a gunman rampaged through parliament. The leader said plans would be expedited to give more powers to surveillance and security agencies.
